Text: Absolutely brilliant film, one of the all-time greats.  Do not miss this.

This is a Herzog related comment: I just uploaded "Requiem for a Dying Planet", the soundtrack to The Wild Blue Yonder & The White Diamond.

http://thepiratebay.org/tor/3968127/Requiem_For_A_Dying_Planet_-_Werner_Herzog__Ernst_Reijseger_And_

If you're trying to play this back on Linux (and possibly OS X), you might run into some trouble with the audio. I couldn't get it to play correctly on either VLC, xine, or mplayer. To fix it, simply use avidemux2 to recompress the audio into mp3 or vorbis.
